Invocation Name: hotel tycoon
des:
Welcome to Hotel Tycoon!

Immerse yourself in the exciting world of hotel management and become the ultimate hotel manager. Design, build, and manage your own hotel that will capture the hearts of your guests. Your assistant Sally will provide you with valuable tips. Together with your management team, consisting of three other staff members, you will create a true vacation paradise.

DESCRIPTION
===========

In Hotel Tycoon, you take on the role of an aspiring hotel manager. Your adventure begins with a piece of empty land that you must transform into a fascinating hotel. Starting with a rating of 0 stars, it's up to you to develop your hotel into a 5-star luxury hotel.

The construction yard is the hub for your hotel's development. Brian, the head of the construction yard, will help you build structures and enhance your hotel with upgrades. Step by step, you will turn your hotel into a true vacation paradise.

A varied events program is essential for guest satisfaction. Josh, the head of the events office, will assist you in expanding the program with activities like parasailing and snorkeling tours. Also, manage the entertainers to ensure there is enough staff for the events without incurring unnecessary costs.

Gastronomy plays a key role in the success of your hotel. Sarah, the restaurant manager, will help you expand the menu with culinary highlights. Ensure there are enough chefs to provide guests with an unforgettable culinary experience.

Your decisions influence the popularity and satisfaction of the guests. Happy guests will attract more vacationers and increase your revenue. Manage your resources carefully, invest wisely, and ensure your hotel runs smoothly.

Are you ready to experience the magic of owning your own hotel? Build your ultimate vacation paradise that will capture the hearts of young and old alike. Your adventure begins here – good luck, hotel manager!

AWARDS
======

Throughout your career as a hotel manager, you can earn numerous awards in five categories, available in bronze, silver, and gold. Once you've mastered all awards in gold, you will be crowned TOP Manager, meaning you have perfectly fulfilled all your tasks and turned your hotel into a world-class destination.

Here are the awards you can achieve:

Award - Guests
----------------
Bronze: 100 guests at the hotel
Silver: 2,500 guests at the hotel
Gold: 5,000 guests at the hotel

Award - Hotel
----------------
Bronze: 3 buildings constructed
Silver: 15 buildings constructed
Gold: All buildings constructed

Award - Interior
-------------------
Bronze: 3 upgrades purchased
Silver: 20 upgrades purchased
Gold: All upgrades purchased

Award - Events
---------------
Bronze: 3 events
Silver: 15 events
Gold: All events in the program

Award - Restaurant
-------------------
Bronze: 3 dishes
Silver: 7 dishes
Gold: All dishes on the menu
